recital.text: The Stockbridge-Munsee Community, Band of Mohican Indians, is a federally recognized Indian tribe governed by the Stockbridge-Munsee Tribal Council pursuant to authority vested in the Council by a Constitution approved in November 1937; and
The Stockbridge-Munsee Community has the authority under its constitution and its inherent rights as a sovereign nation to adopt and amend Ordinances; and,
The Stockbridge-Munsee Community adopted Chapter 65 Elder/Youth License Ordinance on September 7, 1999; and,
The Stockbridge-Munsee Community amended Chapter 65 Elder/Youth License on March 21, 2000 and November 19, 2002; and,

The Stockbridge-Munsee Community desires to amend Chapter 65.9 in order to clarify the procedures for Human Resources to follow and to clarify the person's rights if an Elder/Youth License is suspended and/or revoked.
that the Stockbridge-Munsee Tribal Council hereby amends Chapter 65.9 by adding Sections 65.9(B)(1), 65.9(B)(1)(a), 65.9(B)(1)(b), and 65.9(B)(2).

annotations.annotation: Amended Section YAE.10.09 by creating Section YAE.10.09(b)(1), Section YAE.10.09(b)(1)(A), Section YAE.10.09(b)(1)(B) and Section YAE.10.09(b)(2).
